name: @mhio/test-cli
description: Cli command and code test helpers

scripts.test:coverage: nyc _mocha test/unit test/int && nyc report -r html && nyc check-coverage
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --tag testing --access public
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags

author: mhio
